message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"tea (a drink made by soaking leaves in hot water)","sentence":"我喜欢茶。","image_prompt":"A young person sitting at a simple table (no visible modern technology), happily holding a cup with steam rising, a teapot beside them, calm surroundings.
